title: I'm kinda sad you can't reach full build at the end of Invasion
body: Like, why not? Why not feel the satisfaction of being fed at the end, when you're supposed to fight a big boss? Right now it's just a wee bit bare-bones-y.

It's for balance.

To keep the challenge and threat comparable for all the available Champions, no one class can be so far above or below in what damage they can bring to the park. To keep from having Champions like Jinx and Miss Fortune from being near required to complete the Invasion, they can't dish out damage to an obscene degree more than the supports.

They had to make Invasion doable by a team of Janna/Lulu/Poppy/Lux/Soraka. So they couldn't let there be late game builds, everyone reaches a point at the tail end of mid-game.
Every game I've played the ADs have more than quintupled everyone else's damage...

I kinda like it honestly. You have the supports who protect the team, the mages who provide CC and burst damage, and then the ADCs who focus the weakened and helpless targets to destroy them. Nice n' simple. Not a huge fan of this system on normal games, but for a PvE gamemode I'm hella behind it.
Then you've got bad APC players. All my games so far have had me on par or only 10-15k off damage the ADC's.

Artificial difficulty. 

Invasion isn't hard-- it's cheap.

Giving an ADC enough money to reach Full-Build would be a huge problem for rolebalance.
4 ADCs + Soraka/Janna would roflstomp anything at that point, and IF you balance the Boss around dealing with said champs... the boss would roflstomp any other comp. 
Sure.. a little more gold wouldn't hurt, but this way players have to actively think about their needs intead of randomly buying everything they're used to.

Well Riot DID say they wanted it to be a challenge...

But this is pathetic that I'm wasting so much time and only won twice and lost over 35 times now. I don't have the time or energy for this crap for a single icon and ward skin.

But if I am gonna waste my time, Idgaf now, I'm gonna win.

...Gold. Generation. Runes.

And get something like Spellthief's Edge. It makes a difference if you're at the beginning and your team has the patience to get gold from it.

From what I understand gold generated by runes and Spellthief is reset at the end of each wave; basically the only way you get access to them is if the wave fails and you use the gold while preparing to restart the wave.
It makes you think about your item choices. It's annoying but it makes the gamemode more challenging. Whether you enjoy a challenge or not is up to the person though...
3-4 items is full build now a days.

Miss Fortune... Max W. 

Rush Blade of the Ruined King, Guinsoos, then a Zeal item and something with raw AD like Caulfields. 

166k champion damage... you'll feel like you're at full build for that wave because the adds melt and you hit the AS cap so early.
I think they should increase the gold given between levels. They should also make it so you get to 18 not 16. That really hurts Syndra.
